title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1514/86 of 20 May 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3007/84 laying down detailed rules for the application of the premium for producers of sheepmeat
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1514/86
of 20 May 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3007/84 laying down detailed rules for the application of the premium for producers of sheepmeat
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 3007/84 is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 4 (2), 'the end of the ninth month' is replaced by '31 December'.
2. In Article 7 (2), 'non-recovery, in part' is replaced by 'non-recovery in whole or in part'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
